title: DC's me from game, cant log back in
body: was just in a game with some friends and all of i sudden i dc, i exit the game and the client says unable to connect. so i close the client try to re log, and now i cant log in. first attempt it said error, now its been "authenticating" for 10 mins.   ????????????????????????????????????????

replies.body: Is this still an issue?  It looks like quite a few players on the east coast were having issues accessing League but I believe it's resolved now.  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Hobu0c0G,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-10-04T15:26:50.493+0000)
>
> Is this still an issue?  It looks like quite a few players on the east coast were having issues accessing League but I believe it's resolved now.  Let me know!

im not on the east coast im 40 miles from chicago, which kinda made it worse. im logged in now though.
but my internet is fine? everything else is working fine.
Yep. Internet is fine, just can't connect to League of Legends or Riot's servers. Comcast issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeke Yeager,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Hobu0c0G,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-10-04T07:59:51.783+0000)
>
> Yep. Internet is fine, just can't connect to League of Legends or Riot's servers. Comcast issue.

so then what comcast users cant play league anymore?

> [{quoted}](name=Zeke Yeager,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Hobu0c0G,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-10-04T07:59:51.783+0000)
>
> Yep. Internet is fine, just can't connect to League of Legends or Riot's servers. Comcast issue.

Same here

> [{quoted}](name=springfield,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Hobu0c0G,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-04T07:58:40.861+0000)
>
> but my internet is fine? everything else is working fine.

Comcast will be working fine for other platforms. The connection from Comcast to League of Legends could be down.
Does everyone who is having this problem have comcast isp?
Seems to be a Comcast issue. I'm having the same issue. My poor fellow ARAMers :(:(
